channel.title: How to make NPC's walk around
channel.description:
How do you make NPC's walk around?
I wanna make npc 1 walk around my home
heres what i got
spawn = 1218 2345 3687 0 0 0 0 0 1
Please help
Rep+ u

item.title: How to make NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @samskswanch samskswanch
item.description:
@samskswanch wrote:

item.title: How to make NPC's walk around
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

[quote=“samskswanch, post:4, topic:312881”][quote author=123kdd100 link=topic=409298.msg3021018#msg3021018 date=1257599631]
thats very easy well first you gotta go to the place you wanna add the npc.
and then do ::spawn (npcid)
next go to config ---- autospawn codes.
spawn = NPCID Xcoord Ycoord 0 Xcoord2 Xcoord2 Ycoord2 Ycoord2 1
well the xcoord2 means from wich X to wich X do you want the npc to move.
and the Ycoord2 means from wich Y to wich Y do you want your npc to move.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 07:14:31 am[/size][hr][quote author=samskswanch link=topic=409298.msg3021014#msg3021014 date=1257599567]
spawn = 2821 3222 3217 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke is somthing what it should look like jw if you saved and compiled?
[/quote]
That has nothing to do of wich he asked no offence
[/quote]
none taken im new to coding o.O oh can you help me with this? i posted something in server help im having some trouble D:[/quote]
sure, whats the link

Read full topic

@123kdd100 wrote:

thats very easy well first you gotta go to the place you wanna add the npc.
and then do ::spawn (npcid)
next go to config ---- autospawn codes.
spawn = NPCID Xcoord Ycoord 0 Xcoord2 Xcoord2 Ycoord2 Ycoord2 1
well the xcoord2 means from wich X to wich X do you want the npc to move.
and the Ycoord2 means from wich Y to wich Y do you want your npc to move.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 07, 2009, 07:14:31 am[/size][hr][quote=“samskswanch, post:2, topic:312881”]spawn = 2821 3222 3217 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke is somthing what it should look like jw if you saved and compiled?[/quote]
